category: Herbs That Clear Heat and Purge Fire

indications: Wind-Heat toxin affecting the Lungs and Stomach such as sore throat, cough and mumps

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.
Overdose can cause epigastric pain and fullness, acid regurgitation, vertigo, extensive sweating, chest oppression, tachypnea, agitation, nausea, vomiting, low blood pressure.
There is some cumulative toxicity, do not use continuously.

useCases: Swollen, painful throat from Heat toxin

notes: This is a modern addition to the pharmacopia.
It is used for a wide variety of Heat-toxin related problems, especially swelling.
it is used for upper digestive tract cancers and irregular heartbeat.
It is used in surgical anesthesia.
It is sometimes used as a substitute for Rx. Sophorae Tonkinensis #{ShanDouGen} Shan Dou Gen, in Northern China.
